Break every vassal country free of their overlord. Make everyone release as many countries as they can.

Note that this will not release every country in the game. The shattering process tries to abide by baseline gameplay rules.
No holds barred! §R(Shatter, and even try to release special cases.)§!
I made a mistake, take me back. §B(Don’t shatter the world.)§!
No more, thanks. §B($COUNTRY$ will no longer be allowed to shatter.)§!
A Piece of the World Breaks
\nA country has chosen to shatter the world. All outstanding bonds of suzerainty have been broken, and self-rule is being extended to many countries.
Great. Now to pick up the pieces.
Oh well. §B($COUNTRY$ will no longer be allowed to shatter.)§!
\nThe world has been shattered, and self-rule has become an attractive proposition in $COUNTRY$.
\nThe time has come to grant self-rule to $FROMCOUNTRY$.
